text: The boys' doubles tournament of the 2019 Badminton Asia Junior Championships will be held from 24 to 28 July. Di Zijian / Wang Chang from China clinched this title in the last edition. ==Seeds== Seeds were announced on 2 July.Individual events seeds # Di Zijian / Wang Chang (Final) # Leo Rolly Carnando / Daniel Marthin (Champions) # Dai Enyi / Feng Yanzhe (Semifinals) # Thanawin Madee / Ratchapol Makkasasithorn (Third round) # Tanadon Punpanich / Sirawit Sothon (Second round) # Wei Chun-wei / Wu Guan-xun (Second round) # Ki Dong-ju / Kim Joon-young (Quarterfinals) # Jiang Zhenbang / Liang Yongwang (Third round) ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== == References == == External links == *Main Draw Category:2019 Badminton Asia Junior Championships
title: 2019 Badminton Asia Junior Championships – Boys' doubles
